Text:
Ok, now at least -my- bittorrent says that the file is 100% complete, so it should work for you guys too.

How ever, IF it doesn't download to a complete 100% you should still be able to use all  the 15 tracks since the only file you should be missing at 98-99% is the "readyou.txt" and maybe the CD covers.

If you feel that you can't survive without the cover, you can download them "manually" from:
http://upl.silentwhisper.net/uplfolders/upload7/C-C_Cover.jpg
http://upl.silentwhisper.net/uplfolders/upload2/C-C_cover2.jpg
Can someone upload the C&C: Generals soundtrack?
I don't think the C&C: Generals soundtrack has been released in any format, and I dont think they are anywhere to be found as mp3's.
Krutan: I just extracted all the music, so I'll probly up it. :)

Man this is a super old torrent, just wanted to say thanks

Unfortunately it doesn't countain Face the Enemy 1, which is the best Red Alert track of all IMO.

The only place I can seem to find it is on Frank Klepacki's site as a stream. But I still wish to find the original MP3.
